ProductionCards.title: Tweet 2 Poem
ProductionCards.description: A web app that takes a tweet and turns it into a poem

ProductionCards.title: Chit Chat
ProductionCards.description: Genereate a conversation starter with this app, based on location, tone, age and other attributes.

ProductionCards.title: Twitter History Bot
ProductionCards.description: A bot that posts interesting history facts and images each day.

ProductionCards.title: Simple Bingo Caller
ProductionCards.description: This app helps elderly play bingo in care facilities. It displays the ball in large and calls the number in multiple languages

ProductionCards.title: Simple Hangman
ProductionCards.description: An educational word game that is easy to use and fun to play.

ProductionCards.title: Loan tracking system
ProductionCards.description: This system helped the lender track loans, syndicator investments, sales commission and many other loan variables. Particular attention was payed to ease of use, compatibilty with accounting software & security.

ProductionCards.title: Games 4 Life
ProductionCards.description: Games for elders that are designed so that they can understand and participate.Reached 100s of seniors with over 30 nursing home customers.
